Detailed Description

Consent class

Copyright 2013 University of Washington, School of Nursing. http://opensource.org/licenses/BSD-3-Clause

Consent is just a dummy table that helps synchronize the 4-block randomization algorithm

Get the last 3 consented patients of a particular user type
